meanings.definition: relating to or involving two or more cultures
meanings.sent1: The interculture festival showcased various traditions from around the world.
meanings.sent2: It is important to have interculture understanding in a diverse society.
meanings.sent3: The interculture potluck dinner was a mix of flavors and customs.
meanings.sent4: The interculture art exhibit blended different artistic styles seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The interculture dance performance was a beautiful fusion of movements.

meanings.definition: the interaction or exchange between different cultures
meanings.sent1: Globalization has led to increased interculture communication.
meanings.sent2: The interculture between the two communities enriched their perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The interculture mix-up at the language class caused laughter.
meanings.sent4: The interculture of ideas sparked creativity and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The interculture market was a vibrant hub of diverse products.
